info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 1:24PM CDT until March 30 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTY...NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL...SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...EASTERN UNION...OUACHITA AND NORTHEASTERN WINN PARISHES... At 124 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Huttig to near Swartz to 7 miles west of Buckner, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Huttig, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Farmerville, Richwood, Sterlington, Marion, Felsenthal, Drew, Fondale, Vixen, Bosco, Oakland, Haile, Millhaven and Folksville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
